meanings.sent1: I alphabetised my books on the shelf.
meanings.sent2: She alphabetised the names of her classmates for the seating chart.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous elf alphabetised all the toys in the workshop.
meanings.sent4: Her mind alphabetised memories like a meticulous librarian.
meanings.sent5: The teacher alphabetised the colorful blocks to teach the children the ABCs.

meanings.sent1: He alphabetised the grocery list before heading to the store.
